destructuring.title: Date New Date
destructuring.subtitle: Date objects are created with the new Date() constructor. </br> There are 9 ways to create a new date object:
destructuring.paragraph: new Date() </br>new Date(date string) </br> ew Date(year,month) </br> And after that you can add value you want or let it blank it will complete automatically. </br> new Date(year,month,day,hours,minutes,seconds,ms). In this example you can see the date now:
